english.segment1: I have faith no one believes. I love a God no one can see. You put your trust into thin air. That's what they all told me. But I believed because of fear, And I can see you crystal clear. I know that you will, meet me here.
english.segment2: I walk the narrow path. Perplexed and befuddled. I'm persecuted, plagued and I'm troubled.
english.segment3: My past my history, My future's a mystery. There's only one certain thing. That's for sure.
english.segment4: It's my God who is so real. He makes my life easier to deal. With the aid of his goodness. I experience true bliss. Do you understand your life is in his hands?
english.segment5: Confusion is my hat;. Centrifuge of hurt is where I'm at. I request some help with that.
